system.description:
The spell makes all household animals go furiously mad, and kick, butt or bite out of control; tear their fetters, knock over the fence; and run or attack their owner. This only brings a small calamity to a henhouse, but where there are sheep, horses, oxen, and hunting dogs, it is no joking matter. When the spell’s power is exhausted, all of them will return fatigued to their rest, unless they have strayed far; but from

then on, they will be less obedient.
